Segment.name: VAD
Segment.comment: To provide detail for vehicle application edit results

Field.name: VehicleIdentificationNumber
Field.comment: Unique identification number stamped on the vehicle by the manufacturer

Field.name: Rate
Field.comment: Rate expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: DealerCode
Field.comment: A code assigned by a manufacturer to identify their dealers

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: DateTimeQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

SyntaxNote.name: P1011
SyntaxNote.comment: If either VAD10 or VAD11 is present, then the other is required.
